description: Defines a data class 'VideoParcelable' implementing Parcelable for passing video data between Android components, along with extension functions to convert between 'Video' and 'VideoParcelable'.

classes.name: VideoParcelable
classes.description: A Parcelable data class representing video metadata suitable for navigation arguments.

methods.name: writeToParcel
methods.description: Serializes the object into a Parcel.

methods.name: describeContents
methods.description: Returns 0, indicating no special content types.

methods.name: createFromParcel
methods.description: Creates a VideoParcelable instance from a Parcel.

methods.name: newArray
methods.description: Creates an array of VideoParcelable objects.

methods.name: Video.toParcelable
methods.description: Converts a Video object to a VideoParcelable.

methods.name: VideoParcelable.toVideo
methods.description: Converts a VideoParcelable back to a Video object.
